Activity: Log in to the system, check emails and help desk tickets for any new inquiries.
Follow up on any unresolved tickets and prioritize them based on urgency.
Conduct a training session for the nursing staff (@rn-1, @rn-2, @rn-3) on how to use the new ticketing system.
Gather feedback from the nursing staff on the training session and identify any areas for improvement.
Update the training materials based on the feedback received.
Respond to any new help desk inquiries, ensuring prompt resolution within 1-2 business hours.
Test the phone support channel for the ticketing system to ensure it is functional and user-friendly.
Document any issues found during testing and report them to @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 for resolution.
